DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Study Lu AA21004 Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , phase III study ass efficacy safety 8-week treatment two fixed dos Lu AA21004 ( 10 20 mg/day ) Japanese subject major depressive disorder ( MDD ) .
